i get an error of x3dAudio1_5.dll missing please help

installed game & got the "x3dAudio1_5.dll missing" error. I then downloaded & installed the "feb 2010" revision of directx from the microsoft website & now it all works perfectly. this also fix's the no sound in game problem that a lot of people seem to be getting. hope I've been helpful :-)
